segment.source: This user account will become the site administrator and have complete access to the system. Additional user accounts can be created after installation.
segment.target: Ovaj korisnički nalog će postati administrator sajta i imati potpuni pristup sistemu. Dodatni korisnički nalozi mogu biti kreirani nakon instalacije.

segment.source: The encoding to use for data sent to and received from browsers.
segment.target: Enkoding koji se koristi za slanje i primanje podataka iz browser-a.

segment.source: The configuration file <tt>config.inc.php</tt> does not exist or is not readable.
segment.target: Konfiguracioni fajl <tt>config.inc.php</tt> ne postoji ili je nečitljiv.

segment.source: To use this option your database system must support remote database creation and your user account must have the appropriate permissions to create new databases. If installation fails with this option selected, manually create the database on your server and run the installer again with this option disabled.
segment.target: Da biste koristili ovu opciju, sistem vaše baze podataka mora podržavati kreiranje udaljene baze podataka i vaš koristički nalog mora imati adekvatne dozvole za kreiranje nove baze podataka. Ukoliko instalacija nije uspela sa ovom odabranom mogućnošću, ručno kreirajte bazu podataka na vašem serveru i ponovno pokrenite instalacioni program bez ove opcije.

segment.source:
Database drivers listed in brackets do not appear to have the required PHP extension loaded and installation will likely fail if selected.
Any unsupported database drivers listed above are listed solely for academic purposes and are unlikely to work.
segment.target:
Drajveri baze podataka izlistani u uglastim zagradama nemaju potrebnu PHP ekstenziju i instalacija verovatno neće uspešno završiti ukoliko su odabrani.
Bilo koji od nepodržanih, dole izlistanih drajveri baza podataka su izlistani isključivo za akademske svrhe i verovatno neće raditi.

segment.source: Leave the hostname blank to connect using domain sockets instead of over TCP/IP. This is not necessary with MySQL, which will automatically use sockets if "localhost" is entered, but is required with some other database servers such as PostgreSQL.
segment.target: Ostavite ime glavnog računara prazno da bi se spojili koristeći spojnice domena umesto preko TCP/IP-a. Ovo nije neophodno sa MySQL-om, koji će automatski koristiti spojnice ako je upisano "localhost", ali je obavezno sa nekim drugim serverima baza podataka kao što je PostgreSQL.

segment.source: A client character set must be selected.
segment.target: Klijentski skup znakova mora biti odabran.

segment.source: A database driver must be selected.
segment.target: Drajver baze podataka mora biti odabran.

segment.source: A valid email address for the administrator account is required.
segment.target: Ispravna imejl adresa za administratorski nalog je obavezna.

segment.source: The directory to be used for storing uploaded files is required.
segment.target: Folder koji će se koristiti za čuvanje poslanih fajlova je obavezan.
Barem jedna lokalizacija mora biti odabrana.

segment.source: A password for the administrator account is required.
segment.target: Lozinka za administratorski nalog je obavezna.

segment.source: The administrator passwords do not match.
The administrator username can contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens, and must begin and end with an alphanumeric character.
segment.target: Administratorsko korisničko ime može da sadrži samo slovne i brojčane znake, podvlačenja i crtice, a mora početi i završiti sa slovnim ili brojčanim znakom.

segment.source: A username for the administrator account is required.
segment.target: Korisničko ime za administratorski nalog je obavezno.

segment.source: WARNING: Your current version of PHP does not meet the minimum requirements for installation. It is recommended to upgrade to a more recent release of PHP.
segment.target: UPOZORENjE: Vaša trenutna verzija PHP-a ne odgovara minimalnim zahtevima instalacije. Preporučujemo da instalirate noviju verziju PHP-a.
Pojavile su se greške u instalaciji

segment.source: The installation file <tt>dbscripts/xml/install.xml</tt> does not exist or is not readable.
segment.target: Instalacioni folder <tt>dbscripts/xml/install.xml</tt> ne postoji ili je nečitljiv.

segment.source: The directory specified for uploaded files does not exist or is not writable.
segment.target: Folder određen za poslate fajlove ne postoji ili se ne može pisati u njega.

segment.source: Error parsing the database installation file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
segment.target: Greška kod analize sintakse instalacijskog fajla baze podataka: <tt>{$file}</tt>.

segment.source: Error parsing the email template file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
segment.target: Greška prilikom analiziranja fajla šablona imejla <tt>{$file}</tt>.

segment.source: Error parsing the filter configuration file <tt>{$file}</tt>.
segment.target: Error parsing the filter configuration file <tt>{$file}</tt>.

segment.source: Upgrade unsupported. See docs/UPGRADE-UNSUPPORTED for details.
segment.target: Nadogradnja nije podržana. Pogledajte dokument docs/UPGRADE-UNSUPPORTED za detalje.

segment.source: A unique identifier used to identify metadata records indexed from this site using the Open Archives Initiative Protocol for Metadata Harvesting.
segment.target: Jedinstveni identifikator koji se koristi za identifikaciju zapisa metapodataka indeksiranih na ovom sajtu koristeći Open Archives Initiative, Protokol za sakupljanje metapodataka.

segment.source: The public files directory does not exist or is not writable.
segment.target: Folder javnih fajlova ne postoji ili se ne može pisati po njemu.

segment.source:
1. The following files and directories (and their contents) must be made writable:

  • config.inc.php is writable (optional): {$writable_config}
  • public/ is writable: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ is writable: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ is writable: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ is writable: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db is writable: {$writable_db_cache}

2. A directory to store uploaded files must be created and made writable (see "File Settings" below).
segment.target:
1. Sledeći fajlovi i direktorijumi (i njihov sadržaj) moraju biti dostupni za upisivanje:

  • config.inc.php je dostupan (opciono): {$writable_config}
  • public/ je dostupan: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ je dostupan: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ je dostupan: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ je dostupan: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db je dostupan: {$writable_db_cache}

2. Direktorijum za dostavljene fajlove mora biti napravljen i dostupan za upisivanje (pogledajte "Podešavanje fajlova" niže).

segment.source: Your PHP installation does not have the XSL module enabled. Either enable it, or configure the xslt_command parameter in your config.inc.php file.
segment.target: Vaša PHP instalacija nema dostupan XSL modul. Ili ga omogućite ili podesite xslt_command parametar u vašem config.inc.php fajlu.

segment.source: Provide a unique site ID and OAI base URL to PKP for statistics and security alert purposes only.
segment.target: Obezbedite jedinstveni ID sajta bazni OAI URL za PKP za statistiku i sigurnosna obaveštenja.

segment.source: Your server's PHP version is not supported by this software. Double-check the installation requirements in docs/README.
